title: Custom Game Popup:'Retrieving Data From Server'
body: When i click the CREATE GAME button on the custom page, it sometimes makes me wait a long time while this 'retrieving data from server' thing is stuck on the page.

replies.body: Happens all the time to me. I have to wait there for a minute or two until you can hit "Cancel" and then you can easily start the custom game. I dont understand why it does this, its very annnoying.

Hey,

Press "Enter" twice or Space Once.

Let me know if this helps.

Hey,

Press "Enter" twice or Space Once.

Let me know if this helps.
I'm sure your advice is helpful but the problem is solved for me already :D.(Riot might have fixed this)
